title: Lagg
body: Has anyone been having like a massive sudden lagg within the last weeks? Anytime I play I always play on the same place and suddenly both me and my friends have a massive lagg and a constant of 900 ms (minimal). there hasn't been a game where I can have a steady ms of at least 100. I have tried every place in my house and always the same. I cant play the same because of this and there is always at least 3 people in each team claiming the same. I dont know if its the NA servers or my internet. I want to know if anyone has been having the same issue because I have stopped playing because f this and its really frustrating that every time I try to play I cant because of the massive lagg. If it is the NA servers it could be great if RIOT could do something about it, and I know that its not easy but still I cant play because of lagg and that is really frustrating knowing that there is nothing you can do about it.

replies.body: Are your friends playing in the same location/network?  It sounds like you are suffering from packet loss, which can cause input delays or lag spikes.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches you are seeing this happen in.  It will provide an overview of what's going wrong as well as some troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know what you find.
